医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
饮用水中的氟化物暴露与儿童认知缺陷有关杜兰大学的一项新的试点研究表明，长期饮用氟化物含量远高于既定饮用水标准的水可能与儿童认知障碍有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231026/Fluoride-exposure-in-drinking-water-linked-to-cognitive-deficits-in-children.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231026/Fluoride-exposure-in-drinking-water-linked-to-cognitive-deficits-in-children.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e40cc5f8-5657-44e4-8950-af72357ed2aa Thu, 26 Oct 2023 22:19:07 -0400 Fluoride exposure in drinking water linked to cognitive deficits in children
基于逆转录元件的基因编辑是否比 CRISPR-Cas 方法更安全？在《Perspective》中，Stephen Tang 和 Samuel Sternberg 讨论了基于逆转录元件的基因编辑作为 CRISPR-Cas 方法的更安全替代方案。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231026/Is-retroelement-based-gene-editing-a-safer-alternative-to-CRISPR-Cas-approaches.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231026/Is-retroelement-based-gene-editing-a-safer-alternative-to-CRISPR-Cas-approaches.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5acc99e1-545a-4294-bf41-c10d054cbc30 Thu, 26 Oct 2023 22:14:40 -0400 Is retroelement-based gene editing a safer alternative to CRISPR-Cas approaches?
疟疾蛋白的发现为对抗致命感染开辟了新途径疟疾蛋白的发现可以帮助寄生虫在红细胞内生长，并在寄生虫的免疫逃避策略中发挥关键的调节作用，这可能为对抗这种致命感染的新疫苗或疗法铺平道路。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231026/Malaria- Protein-discovery-opens-new-avenues-for-combating-deadly-infection.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231026/Malaria- Protein-discovery-opens-new-avenues-for-combating-deadly-infection.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fa30a6c1-7dd4-4737-b05c-d390fadf57da Thu, 26 Oct 2023 22:03:37 -0400 Malaria protein discovery opens new avenues for combating deadly infection
脑损伤专家呼吁美国对死亡的法律定义进行改革在调查了 41 个倡导、医疗和移植组织对《统一死亡判定法》表达的观点后，一位脑损伤专家呼吁对美国死亡的法律定义进行急需的改革。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231026/Brain-injury-expert-calls-for-reforms-to-legal-definition-of-death-in-the-United-States.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231026/Brain-injury-expert-calls-for-reforms-to-legal-definition-of-death-in-the-United-States.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=62ec8722-e590-408a-803c-04636aae71d7 Thu, 26 Oct 2023 21:55:10 -0400 Brain injury expert calls for reforms to legal definition of death in the United States
City of Hope 和 TGen 获得 450 万美元资金，用于验证液体活检对胰腺癌早期检测的效果City of Hope 是美国最大的癌症研究和治疗组织之一，它和 TGen 正在领导一个国际团体，该团体已获得 450 万美元的资助，用于验证液体活检用于早期检测胰腺癌的效果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231026/City-of-Hope-TGen-receive-2445-million-to-validate-liquid-biopsy-for-early-detection-of-pancreatic-cancer。 ASPX https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231026/City-of-Hope-TGen-receive-2445-million-to-validate-liquid-biopsy-for-early-detection-of-pancreatic-cancer。 aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=55a2c0d1-c47a-4912-9050-e9722b7640c8 Thu, 26 Oct 2023 21:48:50 -0400 City of Hope, TGen receive $4.5 million to validate liquid biopsy for early detection of pancreatic cancer
用于生产食品的真菌对肠道炎症具有潜在的益生菌作用许多真菌菌株因其发酵、产生风味或产生异源分子的能力而被食品工业使用和选择。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231026/Fungi-used-to- Produce-food-products-have-potial-probiotic-effects-on-gut-inflammation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231026/Fungi-used-to- Produce-food-products-have-pottial-probiotic-effects-on-gut-inflammation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=24deefc8-e2f4-4004-832b-7c539bb8859a Thu, 26 Oct 2023 21:45:19 -0400 Fungi used to produce food products have potential probiotic effects on gut inflammation
都柏林大学教授获得 ERC Synergy 资助，解开健康老龄化的秘密蝙蝠是否掌握着健康和长寿的秘密？由都柏林大学学院 (UCD) 动物学正教授 Emma Teeling 教授领导的团队赢得了著名的欧洲研究理事会 (ERC) 近 1200 万欧元的协同资助，以探索这个令人着迷的问题。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231026/UCD-professor-wins-ERC-Synergy-grant-to-unlock-the-secrets-to-healthy-aging.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231026/UCD-professor-wins-ERC-Synergy-grant-to-unlock-the-secrets-to-healthy-aging.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3a026944-12f9-44be-9da3-b9794c65b84f Thu, 26 Oct 2023 21:39:31 -0400 UCD professor wins ERC Synergy grant to unlock the secrets to healthy aging
代谢生物标志物可以帮助区分双相情感障碍和重度抑郁症的抑郁发作吗？研究人员从干血斑中鉴定出代谢组生物标志物，可以区分重度抑郁症和双相情感障碍的抑郁发作。该研究提高了诊断的准确性，特别是在传统的精神病学评估尚无定论的情况下。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231026/Can-metabolic-biomarkers-help-distinguish- Between-depressive-episodes-of-bipolar-disorder-and-major-depressive-disorder.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231026/Can-metabolic-biomarkers-help-distinguish- Between-depressive-episodes-of-bipolar-disorder-and-major-depressive-disorder.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=430382ac-90fb-4dab-b0f9-36510bed04d3 Thu, 26 Oct 2023 21:18:00 -0400 Can metabolic biomarkers help distinguish between depressive episodes of bipolar disorder and major depressive disorder?
植物性婴儿配方奶粉符合指南，但引发了新的过敏问题该研究论文回顾了与植物基婴儿配方奶粉相关的营养充足性和过敏风险，发现它们符合 FDA 和 EFSA 指南，并且可能是对牛奶过敏的婴儿的可行选择。然而，需要更多的研究来充分了解荞麦和杏仁配方奶粉的潜在过敏风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231026/Plant-based-baby-formulas-meet-guidelines-but-raise-new-allergy-questions.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231026/Plant-based-baby-formulas-meet-guidelines-but-raise-new-allergy-questions.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ce44c314-88d3-497f-aa27-7f644f73cc44 Thu, 26 Oct 2023 21:07:00 -0400 Plant-based baby formulas meet guidelines but raise new allergy questions
AI 在预测 2 型糖尿病方面显示出前景，但在临床应用方面面临障碍研究人员对基于人工智能的 2 型糖尿病预测模型进行了全面审查，揭示了它们在个体化风险评估和预防性护理方面的潜力。尽管结果令人鼓舞，但该研究仍需要人工智能和医学专家之间进行更广泛的验证和合作，以实现有效的临床应用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231026/AI-shows-promise-in-predicting-type-2-diabetes-but-faces-hurdles-for-clinical-use.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231026/AI-shows-promise-in-predicting-type-2-diabetes-but-faces-hurdles-for-clinical-use.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f68c09ac-93d4-43da-9ec9-3ae0bddbac4b Thu, 26 Oct 2023 20:43:00 -0400 AI shows promise in predicting type 2 diabetes but faces hurdles for clinical use
